channel.title: SuperBass patch, inspired by Korg Volca Bass
channel.description: A patch I've been working on for a while, inspired by the Korg Volca Bass. BA-SuperBass.axp (19.7 KB) There are three oscillators, tuned to C3, C4 and C5. **Don't touch the dials!** Things you can do to create interesting basslines: - Choose between Square and Saw for each oscillator. - Oscillator 2 & 3 can be turned on/off - Choose the LFO type (Square, Saw or SIne) - Change the Intensity of the LFO - Choose the target of the LFO (Off, Amp, Filter Pitch, Filter Resonance) - Filter can be turned on/off - Distortion can be turned on/off This is what the patch looks like. Have fun playing with it.

item.title: SuperBass patch, inspired by Korg Volca Bass
item.dc:creator: @rossominerale Alessandro Altavilla
item.description:
@rossominerale wrote:

What a great patch! I absolutely adore it.
Thanks for sharing it!

item.title: SuperBass patch, inspired by Korg Volca Bass
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

A patch I've been working on for a while, inspired by the Korg Volca Bass.

BA-SuperBass.axp (19.7 KB)

There are three oscillators, tuned to C3, C4 and C5. Don't touch the dials!

Things you can do to create interesting basslines:

  • Choose between Square and Saw for each oscillator.
  • Oscillator 2 & 3 can be turned on/off
  • Choose the LFO type (Square, Saw or SIne)
  • Change the Intensity of the LFO
  • Choose the target of the LFO (Off, Amp, Filter Pitch, Filter Resonance)
  • Filter can be turned on/off
  • Distortion can be turned on/off

This is what the patch looks like. Have fun playing with it.

superbass.png2140x1039 253 KB
